a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Total GDP vs. GDP per capita, 1 to 2022
This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
Data source: Bolt and van Zanden - Maddison Project Database 2023; Our World In Data
Note: This data is expressed in international-$ at 2011 prices.
